name: Readiness endpoint /readyz
description: Tests the /readyz endpoint for server readiness status

steps.name: returns 200 OK when server is ready
REQUIRE: Request should complete without error
REQUIRE: Response should not be nil

parameters.name: Actual
parameters.value: *integration_tests.APIResponse(&integration_tests.APIResponse{StatusCode:200, Body:[]uint8{}, Headers:http.Header{"Alt-Svc":[]string{"h3=\":443\"; ma=86400"}, "Cf-Cache-Status":[]string{"DYNAMIC"}, "Cf-Ray":[]string{"9beffacfdc16fa34-DFW"}, "Content-Length":[]string{"0"}, "Date":[]string{"Fri, 16 Jan 2026 19:22:06 GMT"}, "Nel":[]string{"{\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"success_fraction\":0.0,\"max_age\":604800}"}, "Report-To":[]string{"{\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800,\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https://a.nel.cloudflare.com/report/v4?s=3Ok4LhFT7yoo%2FJVLEfiluTzzQWRoZFLZH97p%2BXLXwGhEeeUwGD%2BUuNEbmxNb8aQzBkN8GHP456kxRPjmb7Z%2B%2F9rkTIAvncQpQfSupkLRXq05%2F5NlRg%3D%3D\"}]}"}, "Server":[]string{"cloudflare"}, "Strict-Transport-Security":[]string{"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains"}, "Vary":[]string{"Origin"}, "X-Content-Type-Options":[]string{"nosniff"}, "X-Frame-Options":[]string{"SAMEORIGIN"}, "X-Request-Id":[]string{"d410ed937ae502a88272d1428775fbd2"}, "X-Xss-Protection":[]string{"1; mode=block"}}})
